lead_paragraph: A proposal to expand the N.C.A.A.’s drug-testing policy to include street drugs was rejected yesterday by a committee. The measure would have imposed a half-season ban for first-time offenders.
snippet: A proposal to expand the N.C.A.A.’s drug-testing policy to include street drugs was rejected yesterday by a committee. The measure would have imposed a half-season ban for first-time offenders.
